# (1) DATA PROVENANCE AND PRE-PROCESSING

```{r catchment_specific_data}

library(fishcastr)
data_ssmolt <- fishcastr::data_ssmolt

# WATER TEMPERATURE ----
data_Feeagh2m_temp <- fishcastr::data_Feeagh2m_temp

# CATCHMENT DISCHARGE ----

dates <- data_ssmolt$date
```
